CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI walks around and explores the toys on the floor .
CHI sits on the floor and picks up the jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes the jack back down
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box and sets it in front of the CHI
MOT helps CHI close the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle with difficulty
CHI waves arms around with excitement
CHI squeezes the rubber duck and holds it up for MOT to see
CHI holds duck up for MOT to see
CHI points up to a picture on the wall
CHI points up to the picture
MOT turns to look at the picture
CHI tries to close the jack+in+the+box
MOT sets the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI holds up the football to show MOT
CHI holds up the car for MOT to see
MOT takes the car and rolls it
CHI points to the picture on the jack+in+the+box
CHI opens the lid and the jack pops out
CHI points to picture on side of box
MOT points to the picture on the box and to the jack
CHI tries to push the jack down
MOT helps CHI close the jack+in+the+box
CHI points up to the picture of the cat on the wall
<bef> CHI gets up and runs over to the chair
CHI grabs the chair and shakes it
MOT looks at the picture too
CHI walks away from the chair
CHI touches the chair with his fingers
MOT holds the book close to CHI
CHI tries to get up and leans on the book closing it
CHI kicks his legs with excitement
CHI looks up at MOT face
CHI points to a picture in the book
CHI kicks his feet in excitement
MOT makes a motion with her hand
CHI makes motion with hand and kicks feet with excitement
CHI points to the picture and then looks up at MOT
CHI makes open and closing action with his arm
MOT points to the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI points to the picture in the book
MOT makes an upward motion with her arm
<bef> CHI runs over to the camera

INV enters to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 14:23:00 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the beads to play with
INV puts the Forbidden Object on the table
CHI moves forward to touch the object
CHI strains to see the object and get around MOT hands
CHI tries to touch the object
MOT puts her arms around CHI holding his arms down
CHI raises his hand and makes a pushing gesture with it
MOT nods her head in affirmation
CHI tries to touch the object
CHI points at the Forbidden Object and smiles
INV puts the Forbidden Object away
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity and leaves
CHI points to the door as INV leaves
MOT takes the box from the table
MOT puts the boxes on the ground
CHI takes the ball out of the box
MOT opens her arms expecting the ball
MOT holds the box in front of the CHI
CHI faces MOT holding the ball
CHI looks at the other boxes
CHI steps closer to the other boxes
MOT points to the inside of the box
CHI tries to crawl behind the boxes with the ball
CHI drops the ball on the ground
CHI sits down and opens the drawer containing the Forbidden Object
MOT throws the ball to the other side of the room and then fetches it
CHI watches MOT throw the ball around the room
CHI climbs up onto the chair
MOT pulls the chair closer to her and turns it around so that CHI faces her
<bef> MOT pushes the chair against the wall and gives CHI the ball to hold in his lap
CHI pats the chair next to him
CHI points to the other chair
MOT opens her hands to receive the ball
CHI holds the ball and looks at MOT
CHI raises arm and points to the box
MOT brings the box over near the CHI
CHI drops the ball into the box
MOT pushes the box with the ball away
CHI gets off the chair and walks away
MOT slides the box over to CHI
MOT sits next to the box watching the CHI
CHI tries to open the box
MOT takes the cloth out of the box
MOT holds the cloth up in front of her face
CHI tries to open another box
MOT stops CHI from opening another box
MOT stands CHI up away from the box
MOT covers CHI with the cloth
CHI points to the box containing the ball
MOT moves the box away from CHI
CHI keeps pulling on the box
MOT brings the box down to the ground
MOT begins to put the cloth back into the box
CHI climbs up onto the large chair and pushes it around
MOT looks at CHI while holding the towel up
MOT holds the lid waiting for CHI
CHI gets off the chair and comes over to MOT
CHI points to the box containing the ball
CHI watches MOT open the box
MOT puts the paper on the box for CHI to draw
MOT shows CHI the paper in the box
MOT draws lines on the paper
CHI takes the paper and begins to draw
<bef> MOT helps CHI turn the paper over
MOT looks at the design on the paper
MOT takes out another sheet of paper
CHI hands the crayon back to MOT
MOT points to the crayon the CHI shows her
MOT points again to the drawing
CHI points to the circle MOT drew
CHI puts one crayon down for MOT
MOT holds the crayons in front of CHI
CHI takes a crayon from MOT
CHI points to the string on balloon in picture and looks at MOT
MOT begins to put the crayons and paper away
CHI runs over to the box
MOT puts the lid of the box aside
CHI runs off and picks up the lid
MOT takes the lid from CHI
MOT pats the box with her hand
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI puts the crayons in the box
MOT brings another box down to the floor
MOT sets the box on the floor
CHI takes the lid from MOT
CHI gets the book out of the box
MOT takes CHI onto her lap
CHI points to the picture on the cover of the book
MOT makes a hopping movement on CHI lap
MOT makes a hopping movement with her leg
CHI points to the picture to count the ducks
MOT points to the ducks also
MOT turns the pages of the book
End of PCI - Book . INV enters the room
